title: Part a.
stimulusHtml:
1 point

One point is earned for calculating the maximum loan and for showing correct work:
Maximum loan amount = Excess reserves = $80 - (0.2 x $200) = $40 million.
descriptions:
No point earned.

One point is earned for calculating the maximum loan and for showing correct work:
Maximum loan amount = Excess reserves = $80 - (0.2 x $200) = $40 million.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

One point is earned for calculating the maximum loan and for showing correct work:
Maximum loan amount = Excess reserves = $80 - (0.2 x $200) = $40 million.

title: Part b.
stimulusHtml:
1 point

One point is earned for calculating the maximum increase in the money supply (MS) and for showing correct work: Change in the MS = (1/.20) x ($40) = $200 million.
descriptions:
No point earned.

One point is earned for calculating the maximum increase in the money supply (MS) and for showing correct work: Change in the MS = (1/.20) x ($40) = $200 million.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

One point is earned for calculating the maximum increase in the money supply (MS) and for showing correct work: Change in the MS = (1/.20) x ($40) = $200 million.

title: Part c
stimulusHtml:
1 point

One point is earned for stating that either the public may not redeposit all the money back in the account (cash leakages) or the bank may choose to hold additional reserves.
descriptions:
No point earned.

One point is earned for stating that either the public may not redeposit all the money back in the account (cash leakages) or the bank may choose to hold additional reserves.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

One point is earned for stating that either the public may not redeposit all the money back in the account (cash leakages) or the bank may choose to hold additional reserves.

title: Part d.
stimulusHtml:
1 point

One point is earned for stating that the bank’s required reserves will increase by $2 million.
descriptions:
No point earned.

One point is earned for stating that the bank’s required reserves will increase by $2 million.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

One point is earned for stating that the bank’s required reserves will increase by $2 million.

title: Part e.
stimulusHtml:
1 point

One point is earned for stating that the price of bonds will increase.
descriptions:
No point earned.

One point is earned for stating that the price of bonds will increase.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

One point is earned for stating that the price of bonds will increase.
